author: GameSpot
description:
We went hands-on with Persona 5: The Phantom X, the new free-to-play mobile and PC game from Atlus. We find out just how authentic of a Persona 5 experience it really is! Featuring gameplay impressions, JRPG combat, new Phantom Thieves, and a look at monetization ahead of the June 26 global release.

0:00 - Persona 5: The Phantom X Review
1:15 - What is Persona 5: The Phantom X?  
1:33 - First Impressions: Not Just a Mobile Game  
2:21 - Controller Experience & JRPG Mechanics  
4:01 - Real-World Calendar & Login Bonuses  
4:22 - The Most Wild Side Quest  
5:11 - Exploring Momentos & Combat Differences  
6:00 - Can You Play Without Paying?  
6:29 - First Palace Boss & Highlights System  
7:15 - Phantom Idols & Support Characters  
7:56 - Game Difficulty?
8:19 - Incredible Cast & Wishlist Features  
9:02 - Can You Play as a Classic Persona Fan?  
9:53 - Story Progression?
10:26 - English Dub Planned?
10:44 - Mobile Limitations vs. PC Options  
10:52 - Global Release Date Announced

#Per
title: Persona 5: The Phantom X — Is the Mobile Spin-Off Actually Worth Playing?
